content: I don't have any dietary restrictions, but I do have a slow cooker and would love some recipes that use it. I've been trying to cook in bulk and reheat for lunch, so that'd be perfect. Also, I've been trying to reduce food waste, so if you have ideas for using up leftovers, that'd be great too. And by the way, I'm still dealing with the aftermath of that dinner party - my kitchen cabinets are a bit disorganized from when I was frantically looking for ingredients, so I might need some help with that too.
